name: figma-format-currency
description: A Figma plugin to format and convert between currencies
author: Yuan Qing Lim

scripts.build: yarn run clean-build && yarn run build-iso-codes && build-figma-plugin --minify --typecheck
scripts.clean: yarn run clean-build && yarn run clean-test
scripts.fix: eslint --fix '{scripts,src,test}/**/*.{ts,tsx}' && stylelint --fix 'src/**/*.css' && prettier --loglevel error --write 'src/**/*.css' package.json tsconfig.json
scripts.test: yarn run clean-test && yarn run build-iso-codes && TS_NODE_PROJECT='test/tsconfig.json' tap 'test/**/*.ts' --coverage-report html --coverage-report text --no-browser --no-check-coverage --reporter terse --timeout 120 --ts
scripts.watch: yarn run clean-build && yarn run build-iso-codes && build-figma-plugin --watch
